Title: Mawlana

Actors: Amr Saad, Dorra Zarrouk, Ahmad Magdi, Bayoumi Fouad
Plot: A seemingly traditional journey of a young sheikh in a governmental mosque who moves from leading prayers to becoming a TV celebrity issuing "fatwas" that are accepted by millions who have ...
